description: Rules for managing Git workflow and version control
content:
# Git Flow Rules

## Branch Management
- Create task branches
- Follow naming conventions
- Document changes
- Update security status
- Maintain clean history

## Commits
- Write clear messages
- Include security notes
- Document changes
- Reference issues
- Update status

## Pull Requests
- Document changes
- Include security review
- Update documentation
- Verify tests
- Check compatibility

## Merging
- Verify security
- Check tests
- Update documentation
- Clean up branches
- Update status
